description:
Kawashima Chihiro serves as the vice-principal for http://anidb.net/ch20888 [Waldstein Gakuin]. She is depicted as a stern woman, although with a penchant for keeping a love diary. She is very much infatuated with http://anidb.net/ch18060 [Bunmei], and develops a hatred for http://anidb.net/ch18059 [Mikaze] because of that. Despite numerous attempts, she was never successful in courting http://anidb.net/ch18060 [Bunmei].
Initially, Chihiro is hinted to be an antagonist, but she is eventually revealed to be a white mage, whose goal was to keep http://anidb.net/ch18062 [Maya] safe under http://anidb.net/ch19562 [Jun`ichirou]`s request. Chihiro is said to be a very strong white mage and her abilities very much reflects this. Being a white mage, she is shown to be more defensive oriented than http://anidb.net/ch18059 [Mikaze], a black mage. She is able to erect barriers, and she is able to materialize beams of light offensively. She has demonstrated healing powers as well; she was able to cure http://anidb.net/ch18060 [Bunmei] who became frozen in time due to http://anidb.net/ch18059 [Mikaze]. While in her untransformed state, she can throw her earrings which can function as flash grenades and displays an impressive amount of physical strength.
name: Kawashima Chihiro
